verse: ब्रजे बसंतम नवनीतचौरं गोपाङ्गनानां च दुकूलचौरम् अनेकजन्मार्जितपापचौरं चौराग्रगण्यं पुरुषं नमामि

terms.अनेकजन्मार्जितपापचौरं (aneka janmaarjita: the thief of sins accumulated over many births

meaning: Meaning:I offer my salutations to that person who is known as the foremost among thieves, who steals fresh butter during spring in Vrindavan, the thief of the clothing of the cowherd girls, and the thief of sins accumulated over many births.
